> Eliding promise bumps sounds like a really nice trick. How did you do that?

No magic, sadly — I dumped the stack into Vim and deleted a bunch of lines!

It's possible that — given that you use `async`/`await` — the built-in stack tracer will someday do a better job with this. Fingers crossed!
